title: Women of the Royal Australian Air Force
creator_credit: Australia. Royal Australian Air Force. Directorate of Training and Australia. Royal Air Force. Films Advisory Bureau
brief_description: Presents the vocational and recreational opportunities for women in the RAAF. Shows training, and work in many fields from cooking, and map-making to nursing. Shows the attractions of off-duty life.
